full_summary:
*****************************
### Project Manager for Interior Design Service
#### Solicitation #23-223411
#### Closed on 2023-03-17T14:00:00

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade, and Development Canada (DFATD) is seeking Project Managers for Interior Design to provide professional services for the management of capital and accommodation management projects at missions abroad.

##### Scope of Work
The successful contractor will provide project management services to assist the Interior Design Services division and other stakeholders with the management of projects at missions abroad for a period of 2 years, with optional extension up to 3 additional years.

### Key Requirements
- **Period of Contract:** 2 years, with optional extension up to 3 additional years
- **Services Required:** Project management services for interior design projects at missions abroad
- **Programme Assessment:** The successful candidate will manage projects to assist the Interior Design Services division and other stakeholders
- **Number of Staff to be Hired:** 4 Project Managers (Junior)

### Selection Committee Criterias
Candidates will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

- **Technical Merit:**
- **Price:**
- **Cited for panel members:** Not specified

### Tender Evaluation Process
The evaluation panel will assess offers against the evaluation criteria to determine the best combination of price and technical merit.

### Communication
All communications relating to this solicitation should be sent to Francisco Lopez, via email at francisco.lopez@international.gc.ca, phone: (613) 791-7443 or online at [www.canadabuys.gc.ca](http://www.canadabuys.gc.ca). 

Attachments can be found at [canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/page_no=1 number=5 link idiotye217739210.9152221661009].
